workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.20647711716444855 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.210920972048195 --weight-decay 0.0006088418084220528 --lr 9.076309601163439e-05 --lr-scheduler inverse_sqrt --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --min-lr 1e-9 --warmup-updates 209972 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.1419778371792398 --max-update 3500000 --max-epoch 15 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
